alert.note: Alert for Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 08 at 8:21AM CDT until April 09 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County. For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near Lobelville. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Portions of secondary roads near Old Highway 13 are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.4 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.2 feet Thursday morning. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 230 AM CDT.
